website_summaries.verdict: The ultimate survivalist's bag, this tactical bag is the perfect choice for a backpacking trip.
pros: Adjustable yoke so you can carry the bag comfortably
Plenty of spots to hang additional gear or pouches off of the bag
cons: Some say the zippers, though durable, are difficult to open and close

customer_reviews.title: Poor workmanship - Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make a BOB and I am less than impresed. The top interior pocket is sewn shut so neither itor the bladder pocket can be used. I've requested a return and the replacement is supposed to arrive 04/29 so we'll see what happens. Right now I'm giving it one star. 05/09 Update: Replacement arrived as promised, sewing quality is just as bad (loose threads, etc.) and there are no ports for the bladder tube. As of today I still haven't received the return shipping label even though I emailed the seller last week. If I could give it less that one star I would.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multiple design revisions have reduced the servicability of this pack.
customer_reviews.text: Got a GREAT price during Black Friday sale. SOG makes good products. Fit and finish here, unsurprisingly, excellent. - I KNEW in advance that SOG had removed the "hydration tube" features to reduce the merit of the pack. - I did not know that the "sternum strap" would tend to "ride up" and choke me. Again, SOG had make a design revision to save money and removed the waist strap--poor decision. I do not recommend this pack, despite its excellent construction, design revisions have made this unit a totally different product than what is described; and what was so appealing to early reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this backpack. It came early, which is cool. I really like the clay brown color. This thing is durable. The stitching is great and the material is as tough as it gets. The MOLLE is excellent and this backpack is covered in it. Great id you want to attach an IFAK or tourniquet/shear pouch. There's a soft line pouch up top for personal electronics, so display screens don't get scratched. The front pocket is extremely versatile, having many different sized pockets inside. All of the straps are very adjustable. This is the nicest backpack I've ever had. This will last at least 5 years and likely 10. You can't go wrong with this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholad

customer_reviews.title: way more than you pay for
customer_reviews.text: the quality here is of a pack that cost 3x as much. It is a great size, its comfortable and super feature packed. I like the quick release straps everywhere. The water bottle holder holds a liter no problem. I can fit a 2L (70oz) water bladder in the section designed for it. the elastic bands to keep extra lengths of the straps secured is my favorite quality of life extra in this pack!
customer_reviews.author: Nick V.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, color bit off
customer_reviews.text: Bought in Desert clay. Had to return and get different color because it came in about 2 shades lighter than the picture. Great bag, love the Drab green version. Great price for well made bag. Things to watch out for: Use the bag for a few days and zippers will glide much better Inside pockets not as sturdy feeling as I would have hoped for, but expected for the price. Just have to be careful with them. Felt top pocket barely big enough for phone. Had to use other picket on top with no lining.
customer_reviews.author: pmonsour

customer_reviews.title: Great for Deployment!
customer_reviews.text: My son who is in the military was interested in this for his deployment. I bought it for him and sent it overseas. He absolutely loves it and says it fits his needs nicely. It is the right color he needed and wasn’t too large or too small. It fit his needs perfectly. It also shipped pretty fast considering how far it had to go. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Zipper issues 2
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought 2 of these backpacks. 1 black, 1 sand. I like all the aspects of the backpacks. However, after reading the reviews and rubbing wax on the zippers, both backpacks zippers broke after normal use. SOG generally makes great products but the zippers on both backpacks broke in the approximate same places. The stitching on zipper in the front lower pockets broke and essentially rendering the lower front pocket useless. I like the aspects of the backpacks except the zippers. Maybe SOG has addressed the issue, but for now, I have 2 SOG backpacks that are useless for my employment needs.
customer_reviews.author: Danly Daniel

customer_reviews.title: The perfect EDC
customer_reviews.text: As a big fan of SOG tools, this bag is a very welcome addition to my EDC. Perfect amount of large pockets and small dividers; just the right amount to not lose things, but still have the ability to segregate your belongings. I use the bag every day, and even throw my lunchbox in it. My only complaint would be that the shoulder adjustment straps don’t want to stay tightened, and I occasionally have to retighten them.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon L.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Used this for 2 years straight for 12 plus Hour shifts all over railroad property. This Bag took a beating. One of the plastic straps broke which wasn’t a big deal I replaced it with a metal Carabiner and tied a knot. What killed the bag was the rear zipper Breaking. Definitely a good back especially if you don’t beat it up as much as I have.
customer_reviews.author: Maksim Sureman

customer_reviews.title: Has good amount of storage room, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great overall pack, has good storage for a small/medium sized pack. Would prefer to see stronger construction in zipper areas, not saying they are week or won't do the job but for long-term useage prefer those areas to be reinforced. Comfortable enough to wear even when pack is fully loaded.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice day pack
customer_reviews.text: Just received this pack. Because its a new pack, I inspected the zippers and threading/pockets to make sure I received a good one. Upon inspection, I was very impressed for a pack at this price point. I found it able to handle my EDC with ease with plenty of room left over. I'm expecting/hoping that this pack will last a while. Great pack so far and a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rodriguez Jr

customer_reviews.title: ... truck and holds some of the random stuff I like to have on hand as well as my weapon ...
customer_reviews.text: This pack lives in my truck and holds some of the random stuff I like to have on hand as well as my weapon when I'm in the shop at work. Works great for me, This was a gamble because I am not a fan of SOG in general, as a company they've never impressed me and some of their decisions make me believe they are more concerned with lining their pockets than their customers experience with the products they make. I've got in it, Spare change of cloth 1911 spare mag phone charger various daily medications prescription safety glasses, back-up contacts lunch gear
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Broken Zipper
customer_reviews.text: Just received my SOG Ninja Tactical Day Pack today. Have to say I am very disappointed in this product because the zipper on the “valuables/sunglasses” pocket on the top is broken. It opens both ways. If the zipper wasn’t messed up I would give it a better review.
customer_reviews.author: E. K

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack as a replacement for my condor backpack that I use for work. I work in construction and my backpack has to be useful to carry my phone charger, food, cell phone, water bottle, jacket and some tools. After two months of use I can say that it is one of the best purchases that I have done but it also has some flaws such as the fact that the zipper is very stiff, among other small details but for the prive you can totally ignore it. Overall is a great quality / price
customer_reviews.author: Daniel H.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is a decent pack. My biggest complaint is that the zippers on the main compartment are difficult to use quickly because they are shrouded with a cloth flap and they turn some tight corners. It gets annoying when you only have one free hand. Also the skull logo is a bit much for my tastes, but I bought a cheap Velcro patch on eBay to slap over it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pack.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome pack. I didn't want anything "big" as I'm only using it to carry a few items. There are plenty of storage compartments for what I'm needing it for. I will probably wax the zippers as I've done on other packs not that I can tell it needs it. Highly recommended if you're looking for a small lightweight day pack. Great value and quality made.
customer_reviews.author: Triumphcorvair

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: I Bechtel had high expectations for this bag because it is SOG but was disappointed when I received it. Inside mesh pocket was ripped and to the top pocket was ripped and 3 of rhe zipper cords was gone.. I'm sure everyone of them are not like that but mine is. Wth.
customer_reviews.author: Dale sorrell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Daypack
customer_reviews.text: I'm in jordan right now and I just wanted a small bag to hold a 15" laptop and a few other items going to and from work. This bag does exactly that and even had small pockets on the front so you can hide pens, passport, knife inside. The bottom vent holes are open so if you set this bag down in water it will leak but Jordan is really dry so that hasnt been an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome backpack
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my husband as a gift as he is into tactical gear. This looks like a military style backpack. Has room for patches and whatnot. Storage is ample, he is able to take a lot of his hunting supplies/gear in it. Pretty ergonomic and he has no issues carrying it on his back. Durable, good material, have not noticed any tears, rips, or weak seams. All good, definitely a great purchase for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Daniella Shifflett

customer_reviews.title: Great style, durability not so great
customer_reviews.text: I have bought the backpack twice now. The plus is that I Love the design and storage is great for the size. The minus is that the zipper tore easily on the first one I bought. And on the second one ; one the mesh pockets on the inside was tore so it is not useable. I want to give it a 5 but I can only give it a 3 1/2
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great for big and tall
customer_reviews.text: I love this pack. It is not perfect and certainly does not provide the greyman factor but it the best bag of it's type that I have found. I had the OD green and clay brown. Very happy with the bag and only changes I would want are very specific to me. I am a very large man at 6'4" and 450lbs and it fits comfortably. I would and likely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: T-Bone Danger Skillet

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control at the factory.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I never got the chance to try the bag out, as the top zipper was defective and I had to return it. It seemed like it would have been a decent bag but I just don't know. I will say that the defective zipper was quite obvious so it should not have been QC'd.
customer_reviews.author: ronaldo crespin

customer_reviews.title: Good value and compete with more expensive packs
customer_reviews.text: Works great and good value for the money. Only negative is the zippers are difficult to zip up even after lubrication. I thinking more wear and tear will make it better with time. other than that organization and size is perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: TrainGuy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, poor quality and color is very different from the pictures. Maybe its the unit that I received, loose threads, zippers feel cheap. should’ve gotten the tan color instead
customer_reviews.author: Jovielle

customer_reviews.title: Great pack not as durable as I would like
customer_reviews.text: First off it is a great backpack I used to to carry a laptop among other things to and from work I did amazing plenty of room but I have noticed in the past week the shoulder strap is starting to come un-stiched which is really sad because I do really like this pack im gonna see if I can get it fixed but I will say it did carry a rather heavy laptop a Panasonic Toughbook. So the pack has been put through the ringer to say the least
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Semones

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I really wasn't expecting much from this bag. I have to say I am very surprised. This is easily the best "cheap" bag I have gotten on line. It is very high quality and works perfectly for me for work. This should be a much more expensive bag. It is easily worth 2 or 3 times what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Kohlenberger

customer_reviews.title: Great for daily trekking or overnighters.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for day trips and weekenders. I like most of the features. It’s well made and will outlast most backpacks. The only drawback was the straps tended to loosen up when wearing. Other then that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne J MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: I rarely review a product, but this pack is hands down the best. Better than my issued DOD gear. Thick material, well laid out, heavy zippers, many pockets, comfortable shoulder pads, perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: J. D.

customer_reviews.title: very stiff canvas
customer_reviews.text: Canvas is very stiff around the zippers making it difficult to open. Hopefully over repeated use the canvas will soften making it easier to open. Not exactly water repellent.
customer_reviews.author: daGoon

customer_reviews.title: Great Pack
customer_reviews.text: This pack is awesome. Very roomy. I love the desert tan look. Seems to be very well constructed. Very well compartmentalized. Good value. SOG did this right! Very comfortable to wear. Easy to adjust. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Steve1

customer_reviews.title: Good pack
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, first one didn’t last a year because the zipper broke. I can see this happening with this one too. The zippers are too hard to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: abs13245

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Zippers are a little stiff but that’s because they’re durable. I suspect they’ll break in over time. For people who say there’s no hole for a hydration bladder tube, look harder, it’s hidden under a seam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should be amazing
customer_reviews.text: Stitching is coming loose and I’m scared to continue to use it for commuting. The last thing I need is all of my stuff falling out while riding a bicycle. I think it’s a great bag if the stitching didn’t come out
customer_reviews.author: Bassett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hiking
customer_reviews.text: This is light weight and heavy duty construction. It will be perfect for fall hikes and holds the water camel just fine. Can't wait to put it to use!
customer_reviews.author: Penny D Norman

customer_reviews.title: Good tactical bag
customer_reviews.text: Best small/med size bag to have, it’s thick and well made. Love it, looks awesome. The zippers are a bit in the rough side, but as time passes while using the bag, the zippers get easier to use
customer_reviews.author: J. Sosa

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this bag but the zipper is garbage and cheap. stopped working the first time I used it. I'm not in a location that I can just rub candle wax on it as others suggested. Will be returning when I get a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great pack for short trips with dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a day pack for working with dogs. Added some MOLLE attached accessory bags for additional storage & organization. Comfortable to wear for long periods and conveniently sized.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Sons friends love it!
customer_reviews.text: My son and his friends think this is the coolest backpack! It is made of good material and seems to have heavy duty hardware on it. I believe for the price I will purchase another one for hunting!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: excellent day package plenty of room. Good value at this price. Compares equally with 511
customer_reviews.author: rtreefanatic

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, wide straps
customer_reviews.text: Solid pack. Pockets are organized well. Comfortable, wide straps, good back padding. I have rucks from Sandpiper, Maxpedition, Camelback, Grey Ghost, and others. This one is my current favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Blacksheep

customer_reviews.title: Storage pockets not very useable
customer_reviews.text: Although the quality of the backpack and it’s mater are good, I was not impressed with the storage. SOG offers multiple pockets on this model; however, they are not very usable as they are flat. When items are stored, the pockets bulk up and intrude into the cavity of the main compartment making it very difficult to store items inside.
customer_reviews.author: L. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: SOG Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is awesome!!!! It's well-made and durable! The price was equally as awesome!!! I highly recommend it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great size / Durable
customer_reviews.text: I had a buddy with this same pack. I really liked the look of it and it held up in the field. Perfect for drill weekends/ftx. Not bulky and very secure. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Guarantee not Honored
customer_reviews.text: After the clip broke off on one of the straps I saw that there was a lifetime warranty guarantee but after reaching out to SOG they mentioned it was made under license and were unable to refund or repair it so they referred me to a third party company to see if they would fix the issue, unfortunately they couldn’t. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag lots of compartments
customer_reviews.text: Large and sturdy. Bought this backpack for my son. This is his second year using it . He has covered it in various patches . No holes yet and he is pretty rough with his bags. Lots of compartments and great for travel
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: I use this for street fairs, hunting and as a carry on for flying. It's a great backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Metzelfeld

customer_reviews.title: Good for everything !
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriend for when he’s riding on his bike. He says it’s perfect for holding everything he needs. We also bought patches for it which is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Water bladder hose hole spewed shut
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is very durable and pleasing except... That the hole by the handle weren't even there! I felt around and there wasn't even Velcro I felt around in the bag for hours and watched endless youtube videos trying to find the holes but finally I realized that the holes were sowed over so what did I do? I had to to a knife and some scissors and make some holes for it which work fine but I would like to have the a trial quality.
customer_reviews.author: Turkey gobbler

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great mid sized pack! So far the quality superior to some of the other packs I have owned in the past. Once opened there are numerous small zippered and non zippered storage areas which came as a surprise. This pack has the feel of durability, time will tell. I use my packs for traveling, packing through the woods and commuting on a sport bike.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Finally a bag my husband hasn’t destroyed
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this bag for work. He’s pretty rough on his back packs and usually breaks a zipper, or rips a handle after a couple months. He’s had this one for about 9 months and it still looks great. Plenty of pockets for everything he carries with him.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as I'd like
customer_reviews.text: functions and set up as any tactical pack is. Lacks durability. One of Two of the drain grommet on the bottom came out easily after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Yochum

customer_reviews.title: Decent bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag that is built well to last. The only thing I wish that is had is an extra water bottle holder. Unfortunately I did not realize it only had one.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Grey

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the money
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a bug out bag. Using it to stash a kel-tec sub 2090 in the folded position in the trunk of a car. The gun fits perfectly with room for six 32 round mags and done extras. Well put together too, very tough. I don't see this thing falling apart any time soon. Great bag, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Xcelsior!

customer_reviews.title: Good day pack
customer_reviews.text: Lots of internal pockets, and even a lined pocket for your glasses, etc., accessible from the outside. The outside zippers have decent pulls, but the inside have standard metal pull-tabs. Easy fix with some 5-50 cord
customer_reviews.author: Charles Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Good pack
customer_reviews.text: Good pack over all . The string on the zipper pulls is a little thin . I would have given 5 stars if they used 550 cord
customer_reviews.author: darrell

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but good enough.
customer_reviews.text: Using it for school. Can fit a 15 inch laptop and iPad with paperwork. Super comfortable. Update: After about 3 months of use, some of the internal pockets started to unstitched.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Liao

customer_reviews.title: Worked well with work and for riding on a motorcycle.
customer_reviews.text: Needed something that was half the size as my other bag with all the function.. This definitely fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: P. Oli

customer_reviews.title: This thing scraight
customer_reviews.text: Pretty frekin awesome bag, pretty roomy in it, I can fit 6 bodies in the bag. My other bags only hold about 4. I’m impressed.
customer_reviews.author: alex wetherington

customer_reviews.title: Good, reliable product
customer_reviews.text: Took on a 7 day hunt in NM mountains as a day pack. Pack performed very well and had ample space for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: I love it !
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product ! I take it everywhere ! Very durable and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Reaperxo

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but we'll made
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected, but roomy enough for an emergency GHB. Seems to be well constructed, and well padded, but it does get moist on your back when carrying for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O

customer_reviews.title: Coyote brown backpack
customer_reviews.text: Backpack is a little smaller but good size for everyday usage!
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty durable, can’t say about whether it’s water proof or not
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Happy teen
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my teenage son who has it packed. Durable and he says the style alleviated the heaviness off his shoulders and back Great bag
customer_reviews.author: dawn reader

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag every day and as my carry on every time I fly. Holds plenty of gear. I’ve had it for a few months now and I love it. Excellent quality highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: RealMatthew

customer_reviews.title: SOG bags are incredible
customer_reviews.text: This bag and all SOG bags are fantastic. I have a ninja bag for all 3 of my older children and Barrage bag for my wife and myself. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brothers Of Survival

customer_reviews.title: blah
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag itself, had it for two weeks though and one of the straps has come open exposing the stuffing on the inside. Not exactly thrilled about that, I just use it to carry drinks into work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hiking
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is my favorite to use when hiking. It is very versatile and has proved to be durable, as well. The external webbing allows me to attach several items to the outside of the pack using D-rings.
customer_reviews.author: Jlbarrett5

customer_reviews.title: its a f'king SOG
customer_reviews.text: Yall shouldn't be reading reviews for this. its a f'king SOG, its got buckles, its got molle, its got a water bag pouch, it fits my 17" laptop... so, yes it will fit your stupid google chrome book...
customer_reviews.author: Evan F.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The front top pocket ripped open after about a month of use. This is the replacement. The first one's interior pocket ripped open and wouldn't zip.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: very tuff day pack.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! for the money there is no complaints. If you're looking for a day pack to keep in your vehicle this is it. Plenty of starage space and it's nice having the molly so you can attach a knife, emergency kit etc...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday bag
customer_reviews.text: Durable, great material, spacious bag. Not the biggest bag but big enough to fit most needs.
customer_reviews.author: jallen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bag is sturdy and good enough for a small hiking trip or camp trip. The compartments are many and it can accommodate a large mug. It has molly straps for attaching other various things as well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Manalo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Not too big or too small. I use it for work and it hold everything I need and more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought it as a tackle bag for lake fishing. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a tackle bag for lake fishing. I can fit 3 3600 boxes and all my other stuff. It might be big for some, but I can put drinks and food in it as well and carry only 1 bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: The real McCoy
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal. We got them for nephews to play soldier and my husband asked if he could get one too. He’s prior service and said they’re super well made.
customer_reviews.author: WickedSmartMom

customer_reviews.title: It's small but built well.
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be a good sturdy backpack for my 5yo son. It fits him just right if not a tiny bit big on him. It doesn't fit a fully grown adult unless they are below 5'6" from the waist up and are skinny to avg weight.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Swanner

customer_reviews.title: Best Diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Using this as a diaper bag and its held up great so far
customer_reviews.author: TWade

customer_reviews.title: good cost effective
customer_reviews.text: good pack, has held up decent for the price. use it every day
customer_reviews.author: Josh bryan

customer_reviews.title: Best day bag
customer_reviews.text: I destroy bags and have found my solution! Great bag. I use it every day in a variety of situations. Love the webbing and quality of stitching. Smooth zippers. A touch small in top pocket but a Fantastic bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality materials
customer_reviews.text: Very good backpack for the price. It’s taken a beating and still holding up very well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price vs quality thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: The color is awesome and the amount of pockets is fantastic the material seems very durable and I love the zippers perfect for a day hike or edc items thumbs up ! Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.author: MstrJ3di

customer_reviews.title: Quality product...
customer_reviews.text: This one I bought as a gift, because I like mine so much.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Harder

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great EDC or day pack! High quality I EDC this bag and day hike with it and occasionally over night however it's not really big enough for camping. Cant wait to get the bigger SOG bag!
customer_reviews.author: William Ryan couser

customer_reviews.title: New favorite bag
customer_reviews.text: This is now my favorite bag. There are so many places to keep my things separate and organized. It is aesthetically pleasing too.. The zippers are of very high quality and the straps are very durable. I keep my gun, extra mag, books, backup batteries, device charger, range flags, ear plugs, mag reloader, and more, and still have the main compartment free to put whatever. I get tons of compliments on it and it goes with me everywhere. The size is perfect and it's very practical.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Higdon

customer_reviews.title: Oh my "DIOS" is perfect !
customer_reviews.text: Well, I love it's very light lightweight for what I need, I M ready for my buywalk buyride, I don't have any complaints thanks ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.author: christian martinez

customer_reviews.title: It packs alot
customer_reviews.text: I like the different compartments that allows me to store things in an easy to find place.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Well built!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, plenty of storage and has a pouch for a 2L hydration bladder so that's super nifty. Seems fairly well constructed. Love all the velcro spots for patches and such. Would definitely get another if I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Good pack!
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it. Sturdy pack, well built, well designed. And the price can't be beat on Amazon. Get one. At this price? You can get two.
customer_reviews.author: GrecoAmericano

customer_reviews.title: Durable and good price.
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these backpacks in different colors. Great day pack for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Odell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Backpack!!
customer_reviews.text: Really great backpack. My husband loves it and used it everyday!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Decent work or school pack
customer_reviews.text: decent quality design. good quality construction. fine for light duty work or school. not military grade.
customer_reviews.author: jckorean

customer_reviews.title: Badass!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely impressed with the backpack! As a veteran, I was used to purchasing items on base made with durable material that felt durable and looked good. Now, I’ve been looking for items such as this but found that the prices were too high. This back pack combines the durability, complete badassery, and an awesome price!
customer_reviews.author: Jose G Aceves

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Nice but a bit cheap. I use it on a daily basis so far just some strings on the inside have began to dangle and the chest clip ripped. But okay over all
customer_reviews.author: Juliodajedi

customer_reviews.title: Great low-cost bag!
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag to use as my go-bag for my car, and have no complaints! The quality is good for the price, and serves its purpose very well!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bag
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room internally and a lot of different possible configurations with the molle webbing, I own 2, one to use daily to carry my essentials and one as a biaper bag for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great get home bag
customer_reviews.text: Great average sized back I use it as a get home bag works perfect easy to organize and holds up well
customer_reviews.author: ally

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Issue
customer_reviews.text: Zipper on top of pack was broken upon first initial opening.
customer_reviews.author: Don Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good Pack
customer_reviews.text: Like this pack. Haven’t used much yet but appears sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jones

customer_reviews.title: Bit smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: the good overall quality and build perfect for hunting or school
customer_reviews.author: andrew

product_meta.title: SOG Ninja Tactical Day Pack
product_meta.description:
Ninja Daypack has you covered with side compression straps, bottom lashing loops, and heavy-duty MOLLE webbing for attaching a variety of optional pouches, accessories, and modular tactical gear. This Ninja Daypack sits comfortably on your shoulders thanks to the yoke-style adjustable, padded shoulder straps, which feature an adjustable sternum slider for added security and comfort. The breathable padded mesh back keeps you comfortable over long hauls. Other features include durable water repellent construction, a hook-and-loop patch on the front for added customization, top carry handle, durable plastic buckles and zippers, four points for attaching a sleeping bag or roll, and dual bottom grommet drainage holes to help keep water from pooling around your gear.



Dimensions 13 x 18 x 3.5 in (WxHxD) Storage Capacity (Volume) 24.2 liters (1,475 cub in) Weight 1.94 pounds This product is backed by a manufacturer's lifetime warranty against defects in materials and workmanship. SOG backpacks, hydration packs, and bags provides the uncompromising style and performance demanded by hard working field personal, which have become prized by military, law enforcement, and everyday users looking for outdoor gear of the highest quality, distinction, and value.
feature_bullets: Water repellent backpack great for daily commute, travel, and hiking; modular design with large main compartment, front zippered pocket, and more
Carries comfortably on your shoulders with yoke-style adjustable, padded straps and adjustable sternum slider; contoured foam back with multiple air channels
Tactical features include MOLLE webbing for attaching a variety of optional accessories; tubing port for accessing hydration bladder pocket (reservoir sold separately)
Hook-and-loop are on front of pack for attaching a flag patch; stretchy side pouch fits most water bottles
Measures 13 x 18 x 3.5 inches (WxHxD) with 24.2-liter capacity; backed by lifetime manufacturer’s warranty
